text: David White RBSA is an artist trained at the Birmingham College of Art. Initially, he was a teacher although he retired early in 1996 to become a full-time artist. He has since exhibited his works throughout the Midlands in locations such as Birmingham, Lichfield and Stratford-upon-Avon. He has developed a personal style of painting by combining collage techniques and oil-based printing. White has been a Member of the Royal Birmingham Society of Artists since 2003. He is also an elected Member of Easel Club and the Birmingham Art Circle. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Members and Associates of the Royal Birmingham Society of Artists Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: David White (artist)
